Policy.acknowledgement_statement: This work was supported by grants P50HL117929 to H. Taylor from the National Heart, Lung, and Blood Institute (NHLBI), U54CA118638 to J. Lillard from the National Cancer Institute (NCI), and MD007602 to V. Bond from the National Institute on Minority Health and Health Disparities (NIMHD), all parts of the National Institutes of Health (NIH). For publications, written, and/or oral presentations resulting from use of this data, please cite the following information: “The original data description for “RNA-seq of whole blood from pediatric Sickle Cell Anemia (SCA) patients” can be found here: (Journal Citation __________)(PMID __________). The original data used for the analysis in this publication can be found in the NIH database of Genotypes and Phenotypes (dbGaP) under the accession number phs______.”

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (IRB, PUB)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-IRB-PUB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community.
Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Only full or expedited approvals are acceptable, and an ANNUAL IRB review is required base on the informed consents from the submitting institution. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community.
